# PED::IS_PED_RESPONDING_TO_EVENT

## Summary
Checks the ped is responding to an event of the specified type.  EVENT_INVALID can be used to test if the ped is responding to any event

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **EVENT_NAMES** eventType

## Returns
* **BOOL**
